text: A 60-year-old man was killed in a drunken brawl in Maharajakadai here on Monday. The victim, Velayudam, a labourer, in an inebriated condition abused Rajesh (30) of the same area. Irked by the abusive behaviour of Velayudam, Rajesh hit him with a brick. Velayudam died on the spot, the police said. The Maharajakadai police registered a case and arrested the accused.
title: Killed in drunken brawl
